name: My First Website - Workshop
tagline: Time to build your first website! :)
body:
### Yes, lets make a website! Some theory first. ### So what is HTML? Hyper Text Markup Language ### ### Enough with the theory, lets make a website! Download the zip file and unzip it. Open index.html and paste the following: ```html ``` To add a title to your website, add ` My Website ` in between the `head` tags Let's explore some other html tags, these go in between the `body` tags Header tag: ```html

This is a header

``` Paragraph tag: ```html

This is a paragraph

``` Image tag: ```html ``` Anchor tag: ```html Take me to hacksu! ``` Div tag: ```html
Something in a div, Brian!
``` ### Lets add some style We can either setup the style in the `head` tag in index.html or in style.css. **In index.html** ```html ``` **In style.css** ```css div { background-color: blue; } ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
